contentrichtext.text: '''No More Mr. Nice Guy''' may refer to: {{tocright}} ==Music== * [[No More Mr. Nice Guy (song)|"No More Mr. Nice Guy" (song)]], by Alice Cooper, covered by Megadeth * [[No More Mr. Nice Guy (Gang Starr album)|''No More Mr. Nice Guy'' (Gang Starr album)]], 1989 * [[No More Mr. Nice Guy (Steve Wariner album)|''No More Mr. Nice Guy'' (Steve Wariner album)]], 1996 * ''[[In a Metal Mood: No More Mr. Nice Guy]]'', a 1997 album by Pat Boone * ''No More Mr. Nice Guy'', a song sung by the character Rothbart in the 1994 animated feature ''[[The Swan Princess]]''. [[Dr. John]] also sung this song for the ''[[The Swan Princess (soundtrack)|The Swan Princess: Music from the Motion Picture soundtrack]]''. ==Film and television== * [[No More Mr. Nice Guy (film)|''No More Mr. Nice Guy'' (film)]], a 1993 German film * [[No More Mr. Nice Guy (Freddy's Nightmares)]], the first episode of the first season of ''Freddy's Nightmares'' * [[No More Mr. Nice Guy (House)|"No More Mr. Nice Guy" (House)]], the thirteenth episode of the fourth season of ''House'', and the eighty-third episode overall * "No More Mr. Nice Guy", a [[List of Welcome Back, Kotter episodes|''Welcome Back, Kotter'' episode]] ==Other uses== * [[No More Mr. Nice Guy (book)|''No More Mr. Nice Guy'' (book)]], by Dr. Robert A. Glover ==See also== * [[Mr. Nice Guy (disambiguation)]] {{disambig}}
